definition: cavity of body/barrel (e.g. engine cylinder)/compartment/tune/accent of speech

sentences.english: Objective To study the emergency rescue of basicranial fracture complicated with massive hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討顱底骨折並鼻腔大出血的急診治療措施。

sentences.english: In the nose, cilia help to drain mucus from the nasal cavity down to the throat.
sentences.chinese: 比方說鼻子，纖毛可以幫助粘液從鼻腔流到喉嚨。

sentences.english: All the tumors were removed by the single-nostril transsphenoidal microsurgery.
sentences.chinese: 均行單鼻腔經蝶入路顯微切除垂體腺瘤。

sentences.english: Early in the morning, the flavor of the sun ran into the nasal cavity, graceful posture in atrium.
sentences.chinese: 清晨，陽光的味道撲進鼻腔，曼妙的姿態映入心房。

sentences.english: Objective Nasal cavity and sinuses is a usual site of extranodal lymphoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的鼻腔是結外常發生淋巴瘤的部位之一。

sentences.english: Finally, the toxicity and pharmacodynamics were carried out on the Rotundine nasal spray.
sentences.chinese: 進行了羅通定鼻腔噴霧劑的刺激性和藥效學研究。

sentences.english: Very intense aromas of red and black fruit permeate the nose, and follow through to the palate.
sentences.chinese: 非常強烈的成熟水果香氣沁入鼻腔，並保留持久。

sentences.english: Parallel assessment of nasal responses using acoustic rhinometry and nasal lavage was conducted to investigate OR.
sentences.chinese: 通過鼻聲反射和鼻腔灌洗評估鼻腔反應來研究OR。

sentences.english: Parallel assessment of nasal responses using acoustic rhinometry and nasal lavage was conducted to investigate OR.
sentences.chinese: 通過鼻聲反射和鼻腔灌洗評估鼻腔反應來研究OR。

sentences.english: A human’s scent membrane in the nose is about the size of a postage stamp.
sentences.chinese: 人類鼻腔內的嗅膜大小約相當於一張郵票。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate CT scanning in the diagnosis of nasal and paranasal melanoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鼻腔及鼻竇惡性黑色素瘤的CT診斷價值。

sentences.english: Tongue Depressors can be used to promote lip closure, nose breathing, and saliva control.
sentences.chinese: 壓舌棒可用於改善合脣，鼻腔呼吸和流涎控制。

sentences.english: But YAG laser treatment may cause more serious mucosal damage and higher morbidity of mycteroxerosis than radiofrequency ablation.
sentences.chinese: 但激光治療術後所致黏膜損傷更重，易併發鼻腔乾燥。

sentences.english: Around 9, 000 people in the UK are diagnosed with head-and-neck cancer each year
sentences.chinese: 每年在英國有大約9000人確診患上鼻腔癌。

sentences.english: Nose drops often relieve nasal congestion.
sentences.chinese: 滴鼻劑常可緩解鼻腔充血。

sentences.english: Allow there to be a softening outwards, away from the the nose across the cheek bones.
sentences.chinese: 鼻腔擴放鬆張向外，從鼻子到臉頰都擴張開。

definition: Eustachian tube (linking pharynx 咽 to tympanic cavity 鼓室 of middle ear)/auditory tube
